column1: Smoque BBQ////Each of us opted for the St. Louis Ribs ($16) and the Sliced Brisket ($14)
column3: the brisket here was definitely on point! It fell apart so easily
column4: so you know it was very much on the tender side. We ordered our ribs dry-rub with their Memphis and Carolina sauces on the side. It was delicious as well
column5: but I think I prefer the brisket. As for dipping sauce
column6: the Carolina was definitely my choice- sweet and tangy!
